task.title: Change the Administration Password
task.shortdesc: For enhanced security, the eucalyptus administrative account does not have a default password when Eucalyptus is initially installed. You will be prompted for a password the first time you log in to the system unless you set the password during the initial installation and configuration of your Eucalyptus cloud.
